review_text: This is by far the best spot for anything automobile related. What truly sets this Canadian Tire apart, however, is their commitment to customer satisfaction. The entire team always go above and beyond to answer any questions or concerns and ultimately, to make sure your leave their facility with a smile on your face. The technicians always deliver high-quality work promptly, and their commitment to customer satisfaction is unparalleled. Keep up the great work!

Excellent customer service, very friendly and helpful staff! I love the products at this store and some stuff can be surprisingly cheap especially when on sale! I definitely will be planning on going back as there is a wonderful selection of stuff to buy and good staff members there who are helpful!

I enjoy shopping here immensely. Especially around the holidays, very exciting for me. I love how they have everything arranged, very easy to find what you are looking for. I cant wait until Halloween to go shopping for stuff or Christmas time, they always have beautiful displays. I love the lights and just about anything you can think of they have it all. Just beautiful.

Has to check it out, as it was much more than the name leads you to believe. They have a deep and wide variety of items from  aisles and aisles of camping gear to electronics and upstairs was almost all Christmas decorations.  Very cool store

5 stars for their impressive inventory tracking system. Asked a staff member about a heater in early summer, an off-season product, & the guy looked on his phone & knew exactly what high shelf it was on. Rolled a mechanized elevating machine to the right aisle that lifted him to the top shelf & he found the item in an instant. Website accesses same database & seems to be reliably up to date on what is physically in the store & what has to be ordered from someplace else.

A big thank you to Dustin (manager of the fishing dept) for the assistance over the last few days on my spinning reel. He was able to solve the issue right away on the line and I couldnt be more thankful. Thanks again Dustin for all your hard work.

Great place for all your house hold needs! They usually have some great deals as well. It can be a bit confusing finding things in the aisles as its such a big store but they do have item locator screens around the store. I recommend getting their triangle reward card and MasterCard as you tend to accumulate points faster and able to redeem quicker.

It was a great service with Canadian tire center! We had a nail on one of our rear tire. We went to costco, bigotire and Mr. lube to get opinions. We were told that we had to replace all 4 tires without even checking. But we just replace a brand new front tire a year ago and only drove less than 3000 Km since. Costco was the worst of all! They were so impatience and told us they had to replace all four tires because they had to be the same brands because they did not carry my tires brand. Their attitude was the worst!  Canadian tire was our last store to get opinion on.  Gensis, Nash and Steven were very helpful and Gensis was very patience with us. He explained a lot of things to us and help us understand the situation. After listening to our story, Gensis told us that they would first check if our tire was repairable then offered options if it was not.  Both Costco and Mr. Lube never even bothered to do what Canadian tire did. They just assumed that we had a nail and all our four tires were needed to be replaced. Gensis at Canadian tire is such a nice guy and a great supervisor/manager I assumed. He went an extra mile for the customer and put our best interest first! As a business owner myself, I really think it is hard to find a great employee like Gensis these days.  In the end, it turned out to be that our tire only needed a patch. It only cost us 70 dollar! At Costco, they quoted us for almost $3000 to replace all tires. We will for sure go back to Canadian for future replacement!  We would 100% recommend this Canadian tire center at Cambie.

Great New Battery Warranty Experience...  After sitting for for sometime my 1974 Alfa GTV failed to start.  I lugged (yes - its heavy) my new Optima battery back to Canadian Tire on Cambie for testing and to find it unchargable.  30 minutes later the warranty papers are complete and I walk out with a brand new  battery. I chose to purchase here because of this exact confidence in the warranty system.  A 1965 Mini Cooper Woody owner was right behind me with the same issue. Great company, with car guys that love the older stuff, wanted to see pictures etc...
The only thing I didnt like about this location was the security gaurd. He regularly harassed people trying to leave, but hes been gone for at least a couple months, so, I have no complaints.
Had no trouble find a helpful staff to point out exactly what we needed. Parking is a breeze because of proximity to elevators and checkout.

I went in for a quick stop to purchase a Piler, I was pretty confused on which one to get and the staff member there was very helpful and knowledgeable and was able to help me find the one that I need. Great service

I bought a cheap air conditioning and it turns out that its absolutely fabulous. Thank you Canadian Tire The air conditioning for $169.00 is fabulous works better than my old RCA It even has an air purifier in it and it works so great my apartment smells great

This review is for Booth in the auto dept. I came in about 30 mins before close because I had to get my car towed to the nearest auto shop. While the service department was already closed, Booth stopped what he was doing to immediately make sure the store would have my contact info and licence plate number. He took down all my details and told me to call him if I needed anything at all.  As someone who worked for two separate Canadian tires for about 3 years, Booth I appreciate you. Customer coming in frantically 30 mins before close? Likely underpaid/undervalued, and definitely overworked? Its tough, Ive been there but man did you make an already annoying situation for me just a little bit better. Thank you sir!
very convenient location! Just FYI they check your receipt at the door, like at Costco...I never expect this and always end up spending an embarrassing amount of time trying to fish out my receipt
I took my partners Jeep Wrangler in today for a minor issue and got incredible service. Super great communication and extremely fair prices. The intake person deserves a raise.

Thanks Canadian Tire for another great deal with our employees its was great meeting with the same people specially when we talk nice groups I love see that team again we have a lovely day!! - ALMASRI,0011

The best thing about this Canadian Tire is the camping scene with nature sounds as you go up the escalator to the second floor. Thats the only kind of camping I can get behind. This store is huge and had what I needed and Im sure what you need. Hate all the self checkouts though. Wish that wasnt a thing.
More than 100 aisles of stuff. Can cater to all your needs - tire to attire, from hair to toe. Whenever youre lost, ask a staff. They pull out a palmtop & are never wrong about their suggestions.
Thank you    Canadian tire . For the friendly , fast service  also reasonable prices . I usually always get everything I had on my list .

The selection of goodies is enough to overwhelm anyone, not that its a bad thing, I mean they have literally everything. Easy self checkout, even though I miss interacting with actual people but technology right? Also they have something to suit any budget, and I have never returned anything to Canadian Tire so kudos to them for that.

One of my favorite stores ever. No matter what you are looking for you can find it in Canadian Tire, sports, plumbing,  electrical,  consumables, gardening, house decorating, car features and maintenance, school, stools, tables, fireplaces! I bought mine there for black Friday and was a super good deal.
Had a great experience with  Booth  from the auto section. He was very kind, helpful and had a wealth of knowledge. Thanks again for all your help Booth!

Favorite Store in this location! Amazing items ( especially Kitchen household items ). Love the Cat sections selections! Finally a place for more cat choices items. Love it! Great staff! Rosa Cashier was amazing services and friendly.
Good store, had lots of great appliances and tools, would come back again

The Garden Center at Canadian Tire this Year is Superb.  Better Prices and WAY more selection and variety than the Lowes and Home Depot close by. A shame Canadian Tire is associating itself with the Retail Failure London Drugs in a shared Flyer.  Makes me not look at it and throw it out.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your fantastic review! Were delighted to hear that you had an excellent experience at our Garden Center. Providing a wide selection and variety of products at competitive prices is something we take pride in. Your satisfaction is our priority, and were thrilled to know that we surpassed the offerings of other nearby stores. We appreciate your support and look forward to being your top choice for all your gardening needs. If theres anything else we can do to enhance your experience, please let us know. Nice photos... Happy gardening!

review_text: I have to give a shout out to the parts department. The person working there had excellent mechanical knowledge of cars and had great customer service, I had a no start issue with my truck and it turn out his suggestion about the starter coils was correct. Especially since my Dodge dealership failed to understand the issue and find the fault. Also want to commend him for his patience with the number of customers requiring his help.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the fantastic 5-star review! Were thrilled to hear about your positive experience with our parts department. Its great to know that our staff provided excellent mechanical knowledge and outstanding customer service. Were glad they were able to correctly diagnose and resolve the issue with your truck, especially when your Dodge dealership couldnt. Well make sure to pass along your compliments and commendation for their patience. Were here to help, and your satisfaction is important to us. We look forward to serving you again in the future! CT Grandview Team

review_text: Very often you can get discounts on wheels in this store.Also, you don t have to wait long, you can register for literally the next day.The staff was polite and courteous.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your kind words! Were delighted to hear you had a great experience with us. Providing discounts and prompt service is our priority, and were pleased you noticed our polite and courteous staff. We look forward to serving you again soon! CT Grandview Team

review_text: Awesome customer service and the supervisor at the key replacement booth saved my butt. They were able to duplicate 5 different keys (mailbox, pad locks, drawers) that the minutekey machine couldnt.
response_from_owner_text: Were thrilled to hear about your positive experience! Our team takes pride in assisting customers like you, and were glad we could help with your various key replacements. Thank you for your 5-star review, and we look forward to assisting you again in the future if needed. CT Grandview Team

review_text: Went shopping the day before the so-called  Black Friday sale not expecting anything but average pricing. Was absolutely thrilled to have spent no more than my budget could afford and managed to buy the name brand products I intended to purchase at amazingly low discount pre-sale prices. I saved enough to complete my project and then some. Staff encountered were available, friendly and helpful answering the questions I had for them. No hassle check-out and I was out the door for curb side pick up.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Doug! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

review_text: Bill Clarke Service advisor @ Granview Hwys location was able to source parts on Easter Monday , after carefully diagnosing Battery-Alternator was the issue .we had a Game plan & an exact price .The Team including  Nathan were all pros and the car was  back by suppertime. EXCELLENCE on a Holiday Weekend That deserves a GOOD Review !
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing your outstanding experience with us and leaving a glowing review! We are thrilled to hear that Bill Clarke went above and beyond to source parts for your vehicle on Easter Monday and carefully diagnosed the issue with your battery and alternator. We are proud to have a team of professionals, like Bill and Nathan, who provided you with excellent service and worked efficiently to have your car repaired and back to you by suppertime. We appreciate your recognition of our teams commitment to providing exceptional service. Thank you for taking the time to share your experience! CT Grandview Team

review_text: Every time Im here its always a wonderful shopping experience. Love all the products they sell, especially the heater in the pictures. I own multiple units of this model. (Works well) They sell lots of great brands known as: Honeywell Mastercraft Noma. Quality of their products are great. (Their stuff is better than Walmart) Good prices! Excellent customer service! Convenient Location! What more can you ask for...PERFECT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Ray! We really appreciate the 5 stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Nice photos! CT Grandview Team

review_text: A big, busy store but when I connected with an employee the service was earnest and helpful. The garden center is good. Always a seasonal section of deals. And you can shop with your dog! Bonus Points!
response_from_owner_text: Hi John, thanks for the rating and review. We really appreciate the 5 stars and hope to see you and your dog again soon! CT Grandview Team

review_text: Security guy i guess named krris downstairs was very helpful and nice, came here in the morning around 10, made my day with a big smile.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience with us! Were thrilled to hear that our security team member made your day with a big smile. Well be sure to pass along your kind words to him. We appreciate your support and look forward to serving you again. CT Grandview Team

review_text: Great size of store. I appreciate that they please ask that you DO NOT leave your dog in your car.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Stephen! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

review_text: I popped into Canadian Tire to look for a few bedding plants.  I couldnt believe that they actually had some that were still alive and flourishing.  It took me a while to find my Begonias and I went in to pay.  I was approached by a lovely young woman who helped me ring through the plants.  It was obvious that she had done this before and it made the transaction so easy.  Thanks for all of your help. This location is way out of my way, but definitely worth going to.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Chi, Were pleased to know you are satisfied with your shopping experience. Thanks for taking the time to provide us with a 5-star rating! Were happy you made the trip to our store even though its out of your way and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

review_text: Love the idea that they are a dog friendly establishment. Staff are so getting and nice with kids and dogs.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Sandra, Were thrilled to receive your 5-star review! It warms our hearts to know that you appreciate our dog-friendly policy and that our staff made your experience enjoyable for both kids and dogs. We strive to create a welcoming environment for everyone, and its wonderful to hear that it made a positive impact on your visit. Thank you for choosing us, and we cant wait to welcome you, your kids, and your furry friend back soon! CT Grandview Team

review_text: A wonderful place filled with tools, camping gear, kitchen gadgets, car parts and toys. They sell kids toys too. Only thing that would make it better is if they had a bar in it.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Shane! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

review_text: Nice environment. And some tips for you: You can search the item you want on their website, they will show you clearly which aisle and which area you can find the product. Way better than asking a staff.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Enson! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

review_text: Two young employees inflated my helium balloons for me at the party city counter and they were very helpful. The price was great too!
response_from_owner_text: Were pleased to know you are satisfied with your shopping experience, Keenan. Thanks for taking the time to provide us with a 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

review_text: Is there anything more Canadian than going shopping at a Canadian Tire on a Saturday morning for things you dont need but that all make you happy and improve your home & garden? I think not!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your fantastic 5-star review! We agree, theres nothing quite as Canadian as a Saturday morning trip to Canadian Tire for things that make you happy and improve your home and garden. Were here to help you with all your needs, and we cant wait to welcome you back for more shopping adventures! CT Grandview Team

review_text: The Asian gentle Tao in part department was really helpful. I was very confused and he helped me with all my parts and explain to me. My first time buying parts for my car. I bought the wrong oil but he helped me find the right oil and many other parts.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience at the store. Were delighted to hear that the Tao was able to assist you in finding the right oil and other parts. We appreciate your business and hope to serve you again in the future. CT Grandview Team

review_text: I went into Canadian Tire with a gift card. The staff helped me with the card, and then said if you need us to help you with your purchases you can bring them here. I thanked them, then asked were some products were. They helped me happily. A lot of friendly people helping me. I go to the aisle and am wondering about something, and there is a staff member who explained everything I needed to know. I have my purchases, and go to check-out. I tell a young man I need help because of my damaged gift card. He says I will help you. He is fun and friendly, and BOOM everything is taken care of. I have my stuff and he says Happy New Year early madam! SO cute. It was a very good experience with a lot of very helpful and friendly staff. Thank you, because you were super SUPER busy.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Junadi! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

review_text: Today they have great sales everyone is working so hard to keep the place nice organized and shiny lots of sparkling lights it feel like xmas i was so excited,  they have xmas flowers every where I wanted to buy all of them
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Liliana! Were delighted you noticed our team efforts to create the feeling of Christmas and our Christmas flowers are extra beautiful this year... Nice photos!! We hope to see you again soon! CT Grandview Team

review_text: Im here to say thank you to the wonderful customer service lady-Mia- for being extremely helpful. I hadnt brought the receipt of something that I had to return, unfortunately. Although it was my wrong to show up without the receipt, she went above and beyond to find the item on my account, and was nothing but exceptionally nice. Great customer service.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a 5-star review and share your positive experience with us! We are thrilled to hear that Mia was able to provide you with exceptional customer service and went above and beyond to assist you in returning your item. We will be sure to share your feedback with Mia and the rest of our team. Thank you for choosing our store and we look forward to serving you in the future! CT Grandview Team

review_text: I love the escalator, I can see everything from the top. Above all, their washroom is spacious and clean.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Ja! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

review_text: Very happy with my purchase of their tool Cabinet at Canadian Tire Grandview. Shout out to Kelsey for sorting my issue out and thanks to their sister location at Cambie for supplying the replacement. 5 star service.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Peter! We will be sure to recognize Kelsey for helping sort out the issue. Enjoy your new tool cabinet. CT Grandview Team

review_text: Automotive Department is very good. Yesterday I had problem with my van. Technical Advisor took care immediately and communicate with me by phone. Even with busy schedule put my van through services and all diagnostics and repair was done by end of the day. On the end he suggested 24 months, equal payments. Im very happy with work done and customer service. This department still makes me happy.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Ben! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

review_text: Biggest Canadian Tire I have ever been to! Good amount of free parking as well which is nice. Also located with several other stores nearby. Had the bolt i couldnt find at homedepot. Easy to locate product and cheap! Thanks!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a positive review! Were glad to hear that you had a great shopping experience at our store and that you were able to find the product you needed easily. Its great to know that our stores large size and convenient location, as well as the availability of free parking, contributed to your positive experience. We hope to see you again soon! CT Grandview Team

review_text: This is one of the nicest Canadian Tires I ve ever been in! Great selection and surprisingly helpful staff.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Trey, Were pleased to know you are satisfied with your shopping experience. Thanks for taking the time to provide us with a 5-star rating! We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. CT Grandview Team

review_text: This location of Canadian Tire is one of the best location and free parking. They are located independently along with other brand names like Sports Check, Best Buy, Marshals. There is a Starbucks and a LifeLab in the next door. Not to traffic before 3.00 PM. A lot of things in here. Perfect to come and get everything.

I basically found what I wanted on my own. But when I asked for help. Customer service person helped me right away. Very nice...and cashier was great and good to talk to.... but as usual you always end up buy what you didnt go there for. Like this watch for only $9.99!

Automotive Department Store We came by to check out their Black Friday sales event. I came to see the two household appliances that were advertised and scored excellent buys. Brightly lit aisles and well stocked displays. The microwave oven section was half empty but I managed to find a boxed Cuisinart air fryer convention toaster oven in stock as advertised at 50% off along with an additional $50 discount at the checkout! Wow! I also purchased a magic bullet brand personal blender on sale for $29.95. This place is a wonderful store for incredible buys. I come often to purchase specials from their flyers when there are things we need. The staff are helpful and knowledgeable. They publish and distribute a flyer every week or every other week depending on the season. This place is advertised as an automotive store but it has so much more to offer with a great selection of housewares, sporting goods and making your home beautiful. Well worth a visit.

I love their Christmas decor section. All the happy Christmas songs. Very festive arrangement and  free photo booth Inspired me to decorate my house very early. And now my neighbors are doing the same
I am impressed how clean the store and nicely decorated. Their washroom reminds me of my house every time my cleaner visits.
Great  customer service. I like their pots and pans section reasonable prices. Be careful  of  the quality of their producs. A much better choice than  Winners for dishes.

The largest selection of products out of any other Canadian Tire location Ive been to. Its very clean and tidy. As it should be for a newer location. Shopping atmosphere is calm and relaxing as a result of how spacious it is. The merchandising methods deployed also helps. Older gentlemen in auto parts is awesome. Knowledgable, kind and direct.

This location of Canadian Tire is one of the best location compared to what they used to have few decades ago. They are located independently along with other brand names like Sports Check, Best Buy, Marshals. There is a Starbucks and a LifeLab in the next door.

Today,  I went to this store to buy some portable BBQ and TENT for our camping and I was so grateful for RJ who assists me all through out. He was so knowledgable about the products and showed an excellent costumer service. I will definitely shop here again and hopefully RJ will be there when I come back.
I always visit this location. The staff are helpful, and the auto service department is top-notch. I do most of my household shopping here.

HUGE Canadian Tire! Lots of ample parking everywhere and they also have a good selection of live plants at this one but not as good as Cambie. What I really liked about this location is that they have their patio/outdoor furniture setup and on display. This way you can test out the furniture to see if it s what you were envisioning online. The other CTs don t really do this so this one was great for that. One thing though is this one doesn t have any self checkout stations and there was a huge lineup and only one person jumped on to another cashier to help the one cashier for the longest time. I m a fan of self checkouts for this reason.
I like this Canadian Tire location a lot, the staff is always friendly and knowledgeable. Great parking as well as a Starbucks nearby.

Best customer service by Michael. Took ownership to look for a part I was looking for, couldnt find it even in the storage. Offered to help me by calling other store. Thank you Michael for going above and beyond.
Had a few questions about my truck Staff were very knowledgeable and were really quick to help me!
Fantastic store , they have everything and better price than Amazon,  see for yourself, plus friendly and professional people ready to help,  by supporting local business you support local economy

Canadian Tire handles auto inspections and RIV inspections with expert precision. Comfortable waiting area and convenient indoor parking spaces. Highly recommend their capable and friendly staff and I ll be coming back for basic auto needs and  guy toys  shopping for sure.

Scosche cell phone magnet holder for the car is extremely good quality. The magnet is much easier and convenient over other products. It s easy to reposition to eye level, and can hold any phone size. After three months of use when the product was super tight in the socket, I had a small issue by pulling the plug out on an angle too fast. Rather than fixing it, I returned it to the store with my triangle card and exchanged it for a new one. They found my receipt by tracking the purchase date. Very satisfied with service and auto accessories!
Everything required for a house other than groceries,  vegetables and fruits under one roof. Best was gardening material.
I love this place for garden needs all the way to tools and activities for the kids. Tons of varieties for summer fun.
Helpful with choosing car tires. Answered all my questions thoroughly. Their assistance was nice.
Great selection of various products and clean branch, staffs are great willing to help. Fast check out time. Lots of free parking available on First and second floor.

One of the largest Canadian Tires I know. Loads of parking. Clean and well stocked. Easy to find where my items were located. If not, there is always help just around the corner. Will recommend especially for car lovers like my self the whole bottom section is for cars.
Helpful and Kind Staff!! Best Car accessories

If you want to get the best service at this Canadian Tire, Connor is the guy you should ask for help. I wanted to change my battery of my car today. I was so lucky to get Connors service. He asked a couple of questions to make sure I did need to change the battery. He even took his time to test the battery for me. When I decided to change the battery, he recommended the reasonable one for me. He also offered me two options to replace it: let their machinists do that for me (charge 68$) or by myself. In order to save the money, I chose to do that by myself.  I asked Connor to lent me the tools and tried it. Unfortunately, it was not as simple as I thought and gave it up, and I turned to the machinists for help, but none of them were available at that moment and asked me to leave my car there and they might replace it tomorrow. I was so disappointed and turned to Connor for help again. By the rule, Connor is not allowed to replace the battery for me, but he still be so nice to stand beside and guide me how to do that properly. With his instructions, I finally replace my battery. To be honest, I bothered Connor so many times today, but he was so patient and offered me the best service all the time! Connor, thank you so much for saving my day!

If you have the right car, use the curbside pick up if you have heavy items. Just do your part by clearing your car, and everything will go smoothly. They got the equipment to help you put it in your car. The guy that helped us was quick and knew what to do. We didnt have to wait long when we checked in at the designated spot -- approx. 5-10 minutes on a Sunday afternoon.
Debbie D, is so nice and professional! She is always ready to help any customers.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Chris, thanks for the 5-star review! Corporate Customer Experience Team

review_text: As always I had success finding what I needed at my local Canadian Tire.  I was able to locate the item via the website and then had a staff member unlock the caged area where the item was stocked.  He was helpful, ensuring that I had the correct item number.  The bonus was that the item was even on sale!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars review, Deanna! We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the service and the selection of items. We are looking forward to seeing you again! The Corporate Customer Experience Team

review_text: Canadian Tire in Park and Telford is my favourite location, the store is big, clean and bright. It s very beautiful during the Christmas time. The photos taken are from the Black Friday, it was busy but not too busy.

Year after year after year after year we continue to receive outstanding service from the Auto department!  We are always impressed by the work, customer attention, and knowledge.  Ive never had a complaint and intend to continue using them in the future.  Cheers!
response_from_owner_text: Hi, Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We re thrilled to hear you had a great auto service experience with us. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

review_text: my interaction with kamand  was outstanding. Their exceptional communication skills, product expertise, and willingness to assist left a lasting positive impression. I commend their commitment to excellence and would highly recommend their service to others.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Brenda! Were happy we were able to provide you with an excellent service from Kamand. Your feedback is important to us, we appreciate it! Corporate Customer Experience Team

review_text: I recently had the pleasure of interacting with one of your customer service representatives kamand , and I must say it was an exceptional experience. From the moment I reached out for assistance, their professionalism and helpfulness were evident.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Ali, Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We re thrilled to hear you had a great service from Kamand. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

review_text: we love to go to Canadian Tire for seasonal products, this visit was for our Halloween Decorations. we find the best options for our themes. and reasonable priced.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5 stars, Heather! Were happy you were able to find what you needed in our store! Corporate Customer Experience Team

review_text: Best experience with Sebastian in the mechanic department - I came in because one of my windshield wipers were broken and he walked me through the whole process! Super helpful, kind and generous with his attention. Would highly recommend going to see him! Canadian Tire, great employee
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the 5-star review, Danielle! Were happy we were able to provide you with an excellent service from Sebastian. Your feedback is important to us, we appreciate it! Corporate Customer Experience Team

review_text: Initially I had problems ordering a red tea whistling tea kettle online at the Canadian Tire Website, and then phoned the Main Street store in North Vancouver to arrange for pick up, because there were only 2 kettles left on the shelf.  I spoke with Hammad, and he was so helpful and very polite, explaining all he was going to do; then put me on hold momentarily to locate the kettle.  When he returned, he informed me that he did put the kettle on hold, and I went that same evening to pick it up.  I was so grateful for all of his help, and Hammad has proven to be such a good Customer Service Associate.  Thank you Hammad!
response_from_owner_text: Hi Meg, Thank you for the kind review and 5-star rating! We re thrilled to hear you had a great service from Hammad. We look forward to seeing you again! Corporate Customer Experience Team

review_text: I often drifted in to buy parts and tools for my old pickup and liked the friendly service that you never get at Lordco or Bumper to Bumper. This year I got the Canadian Tire VIP card which was a fantastic deal. I feel bad when the survey asked if anyone made my visit special because I don t need anyone now. I walk through the doors, pull up my C.T. App and search for what I am looking for. Batteries (Isle 13), electrical Isle 56. And, more importantly they are right where the app says and always in stock. Take note Rona get organized or you will be out of business soon as you are hopeless at stock control and customer service.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you! We love hearing from great customers like you! Corporate Customer Experience Team

review_text: This store has most of the things that you are looking for.    nice manager. One of the manager is so nice and helpful. I don t know her name. She is in early 60s ( I guess) she is so nice.

review_text: Canadian Tire in Richmond, BC, is a reliable go-to for all your household and outdoor needs. This store has a wide selection of products, from automotive supplies to home improvement tools, making it a versatile one-stop shop. The knowledgeable staff members are always ready to assist and provide helpful recommendations. The well-organized aisles and clear signage make navigation easy, ensuring a convenient shopping experience. Whether youre tackling a DIY project, stocking up on outdoor gear, or simply browsing for home essentials, Canadian Tire in Richmond has you covered. Its a trusted destination for quality products and friendly service.

review_text: Great service! Took the time to listen! Excellent diagnostics! Can t thank the shop enough. My daughter is a person with a disability, so her vehicle is very important to her as accessible transportation is not always available. The shop was very understanding, very responsive and very helpful. Would definitely go back!  Special thanks to Alex for the exceptional above and beyond service!

You and your daughters trust in our service means a lot, and were always here to assist with any future needs. Please dont hesitate to reach out anytime! review_text: Loyal customer here. Keep coming back here to get My Auto done. Great job to all the staff most of all GENESIS, JOEY and Kevin who always give the best excellent service and being helpful to us. Thank you all for doing all your best. Kudos to all.

Effective and efficient service from Canadian Tire! They were timely and communicative with what was happening. In particular, Justin at the front desk was SO helpful! He was the only consistent employee at the desk and helped incoming customers as well as writing up reports and checking in with the service team. He was polite, professional, and so helpful!! I really, really appreciate him!

review_text: Great service and very competent team - they were able to squeeze us in within a day and have our vehicle fixed quickly while we were visiting from out of town. Robbie and Kyle did phenomenal work, thanks again!
response_from_owner_text: Hello Shan, Thank you for your wonderful feedback! Ive passed this on to the both of them, and they truly appreciated your kind words. We hope you have a wonderful weekend, and a safe trip home. Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager 604-707-2291

review_text: 5 stars specifically for Genesis. I called in before bringing in my car(flat tire) and was told by the representative that they have the exact same tire on location and provided me the latest time/day it will be finished. That day came and when I called to check if my car is ready, turned out they do not have the tire and will have to be ordered and shipped from a different location. At this point, I was given another day/time when it will be completed. I received a call saying my car is finished, I came back and the car is not ready nor is the tire even on location. No one seems to be taking ownership of the 2 mistakes with the exception of Genesis. He took ownership of the issue and provided me with creative solutions to have the car ready at the time I needed it by. He was able to have my car ready within a very short time frame. We (consumers) need more reps like Genesis. Service: Tires
Always great and on the spot. Not cheap but at least they do really know what they do and they do it as fast as they can

Amazing people: I have an emergency with my tire and it was 15min to close. They decided to change the spare tire for me for free and provided lots useful informations. I love how the staff here are so honey and sincere. I will definitely come here for everything      thank you guys for the emergency in that rainy night!
The mechanics saw my car with a cooling problem the day of on Canada Day and got it fixed in under 4 hours. Can t get better service than that.
response_from_owner_text: Hello there, Were thrilled to hear about your positive experience, especially on Canada Day! Ensuring our customers are back on the road safely and swiftly is our top priority. Thank you for trusting us with your cars cooling issue. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to assisting you again in the future. Warm regards, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

review_text: Shop foreman Robbie did a fine job for me. Went above and beyond.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Anthony, Thank you very much for taking the time to provide your positive feedback about Robbie, our shop foreman. We are thrilled to hear that he was able to go above and beyond to meet your needs. At Canadian Tire, we take pride in our staff and their commitment to excellent customer service. Ill make sure to pass on your kind words to Robbie. If there is anything else we can assist you with, please dont hesitate to reach out. Best regards,

review_text: When I was getting an oil change at a different provider they had indicated to me that I needed to get my transmission fluid refilled. I chose not to do that at that provider. I checked it myself and then popped up to Canadian Tire Auto and one of the gentleman helped me and validated that I didn t need to get it refilled / topped up. I appreciated his honesty and willingness to help me out!
Shawn, John and Alex, thank you for helping with the tire problem in last minute. Much apreciate your help and fast thinking.

I recently had a wonderful experience at this location, with amazing customer service from Gen and Allen, the technician. When my car broke down while visiting from the US, they fit me in on short notice and stayed late to help me get home only one day later than planned. I really appreciated their great communication, reasonable prices, and going above and beyond to resolve the issues.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Isabelle, Thank you so much for the kind words! Ive passed this on to Gen and Alen, and they were both very happy to see their efforts didnt go unnoticed! We are also glad to hear you got home safely, and would like to thank you for your business. Have a great weekend! Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

review_text: Canadian Tire Automotive Service work over their duties to assure I had a great service and explain further regarding my car problems. Also referring to a different shop for the job it cant be performed in their own shop. Rob know his way around cars and he broke down the explanation to make sure I know what to do next. And gave his expertise on any advice he provided. I widely recommend their services and assure you that your car is in great hands.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Miguel, Thank you for the 5 star review! Im happy to see your visit with us was a positive one. Have a wonderful Christmas! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

review_text: Simply the best auto shop Ive been to on all accounts. The work done is always top notch, timely, and well priced. The customer staff have always been helpful and courteous. Unlike other shops I had tried before, its nice to see that the staff here take the time to help you from start to finish rather than get interrupted every time someone comes to the counter for a quick question. Definitely recommend this auto shop for anyone who wants to make sure their vehicle is serviced properly.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Hans! Thank you very much for your kind words. We work very hard to provide every customer with the best service possible, so I am happy to hear your experience with us reflected that. We look forward to seeing you again! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Cambie Canadian Tire Service Center 604-707-2291

review_text: Friendly service/admin group. I had my tire inspected as another mechanic found a nail stuck on my left car tire and suggested I get it checked and to not pull it out in case it would cause more damage. After a quick half hour at Canadian tire, I got a call back and they had discovered the nail was a small screw and hadnt in fact punctured the tire but just the in tracks. They didnt charge me a cent for this and I went on my merry way.

Made an appointment to get an oil change and a new battery installed. Service was fast and friendly and I was pleasantly surprised that it didnt cost me an arm and a leg. Top tier service. Bravo to the team at this location.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Steven, Thank you so much for your recent business and wonderful feedback! Our team is always happy to help and we are thrilled to hear your visit was a positive one. Have a great week! Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

review_text: I have taken my car here for a few years now. Always courteous staff and great work. Today, they quickly fixed the rock plate of my car, Sal allowed me to come pick it up after closing which I appreciated.

My car completely died on Yukon in front of the auto shop and as I was pushing the car into the ally, Mark saw and came to help. The shop had already closed, but he asked his two colleagues to come take a look. They did a few tests and ruled out that it was likely a dead battery. Jake and Genesis stayed after hours to replace my battery so that I could get home safely. I am so grateful for the three of them for going above and beyond to help me out on a rainy Friday night.
response_from_owner_text: Hello Chelsia, Thank you very much for the positive review! Our team was happy to help and we are glad you got home safely. Please keep us in mind for any future needs your vehicle may have! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

review_text: Thank you Rob for the great service!!! You saved me from roasting without AC. Super efficient and honest :)
response_from_owner_text: Hello Maureen, On behalf of Rob, wed like to thank you for the 5 Star Review! Were so glad we could help you out with the repairs on your A/C system, and truly appreciate your business. Have a great weekend! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager 604-707-2291

review_text: I went in for my class 7 road test, but wasn t able to leave the icbc parking lot, because my brake lights weren t working. I went to Canadian Tire to see if I could potentially get them fixed so I could go back and retry the test, and they fixed them immediately. Excellent and fast service!!
response_from_owner_text: Hello Fraser, I am very happy to hear about your positive experience with us! We do our best to help customers in time of need, and we truly appreciate your business. Have a great weekend! Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

review_text: Brought my Ferrari in for a safety inspection.  I imported it from Ontario...so it needs the BC safety inspection before it can be registered and licensed in BC. These folks were so accommodating with time frames to get me in when my car arrived in Vancouver. Very friendly on the phone and in person. But the thing that put this shop over the top was when they did with my car when it was ready for pick up. See the photo. I mean how incredibly thoughtful... Parking my pride and joy way off in the  corner in a dedicated double spot so there is was chance or an errant door ding from a car parked next door, or an unmanned runaway shopping cart! Thanks to the folks at Can Tire for the thoughtful gesture.
response_from_owner_text: Hello there, Ive shared this with the team, and everyone was thrilled to see your appreciation for detail! We take pride in taking care of all our customers cars, and your beauty was definitely no exception. Im glad we were able to accommodate a time for you, and greatly appreciate the feedback and 5 star review. Enjoy the roads! Sincerely, Johnny Ray Ritchie Operations Manager Canadian Tire Auto Service 604-707-2291

review_text: I called in the afternoon of the 18th with an urgent issue and Genesis was able to fit me in with Robbie, the shop foreman. He was able to diagnose and repair the issue last minute. Im so grateful for the help, absolutely above and beyond service at this location. Thank you guys so much for helping me out, I appreciate it more than you could know. Anxiety attack avoided! Thank you so much!

Definitely will continue to use Canadian Tire Auto Service Centre. -Liam

review_text: I need it Winter Tires for my GMC vehicle, and Tao the Manager of the Shop suggested me to get the Michelin tires for my SUV.  They had it installed and also they check to see if there was anything else my vehicle was in need of repair work need it. Peter the installer was so nice to pack my All Season Tires in a Bag without any ripping and cleaned. I have taken my vehicle for repairs for many years now and I trust thier work and dedication plus they care for the customer and tell you what is need it and what you dont need as many other shops that try to sell you things you dont need. I would recommend this location to anyone who needs any kind of work for your vehicle. Clean Shop, Nice and pleasant staff plus excellent service. As Auto Centre Repair Shop they perform many type of repairs like: Tire Installation, Tire Change, Engine Repair, Car Inspection, Tire Centre, Tire Shop, Oil Change, Tire Repair, Car Repairs, Van Repairs, Truck Repairs, Book Appointment, Winter Installation, Summer Installation, Radiator Repair and System Flush, Transmission Oil Change, Repairs, Shop, Flat Tire Repair.

Its great to see such a detailed review outlining all the various services we provide our customers coming from a prominent local guide. Thank you for giving us the opportunity to serve you over the years. We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you during your next visit. - Chris, General Manager

review_text: In store shopping two week ago and found excellent staff service with locating all the shoppings I need. The employee  Mei Lin  was fast and efficient into helping me find all the items I need, she also helped me locate two hand-trucks and push them to the cashier for me. Well done!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Richard! We will be sure to recognize Mei Lin for her efforsts. We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! CT Grandview Team

review_text: Superb service, communication, and pricing. For something straightforward like a tire change, you cant go wrong here. Its not their fault the City of Vancouver decided to divert most of its residential development to commercial and industrial areas, creating a shortage of mechanic shop space. All shops are busy these days. Service: Tires
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Sebastian! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

review_text: Talk about above-and-beyond service! Servive Advisor Bill Clarke went out of his way to help me keep my car running, gave realistic advice to determining the priority and schedule proceed. Im also thrilled at the work your mechanics were able to provide. Ill be recommending your service centre to anyone with a vehicle, and you and Bill have secured tjis location a customer for life.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Erika! We really appreciate the 5-stars and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit! Grandview Auto Centre Team

review_text: After having a negative experience at the Canadian Tire Auto Centre in North Van on Saturday, the Grandview location has restored my faith in the brand. Stanley was extremely helpful over the phone and I was able to get my car looked at within half an hour of calling. They took my car in right before closing and managed to patch my tire all within about 2 hours of the first phone call (over Easter weekend as well). Any time I have needed work done quickly without breaking the bank, this location has always been wonderful to deal with.
response_from_owner_text: Hi Sammie, Thanks for taking the time to provide us with this feedback. Im pleased to hear Stanley was helpful and able to get your vehicle into the shop quickly. Were lucky to have experienced advisors like Stanley on our team. Well see you next time you! Tao, Auto Service Centre

review_text: Stopped in last min to get some help with some missing lug nuts we discovered after my car started making a horrible sound. Everyone was so lovely and went the extra mile to help us out. The thing that really stood out was just the genuine care and even great conversation!! You have some wonderful, kind hearted people on your team working there! Kudos you rescued us and made our night!!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks, Lauren! We really appreciate the 5 stars and are happy to be able to help you out. Our Auto team will be pleased to know that their efforts were appreciated. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit. Amanda, Auto Centre Manager

review_text: I recently bought a second hand Subaru and brought it to Canadian Tire for inspection and service. Whatever it is you need the man to see is Bill Clarke. Bill was professional, efficient and most of all personable when helping me. He took time to explain what service diagnosis was for the car and brought me to the floor to review. Also, he gave, what seemed to me,  honest advice about when certain maintenance did / did not need to be done. Bill Clarke is the man, see him for help with auto related items. Thanks for your help!
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for sharing this experience, Jared. We are very fortunate to have team members like Bill who strive to provide a 5-star experience to our customers. Ill be sure to recognize Bill for a job well done. Enjoy your new ride! Chris, General Manager

review_text: I store my winter tires with this location, and had the check engine light come on just before I was going to get my tires swapped over for the spring. I decided to get the whole car checked over and oil changed, etc. They provide the work order of everything that needed some work and advised what needed to be done immediately vs what could be put off which I really appreciated. I ll definitely be going back for more honest work/repairs.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Dan! Im happy to hear you appreciate us outlining the recommended and suggested work for your vehicle on the work order. See you next time! Tao, Auto Service Manager
